subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Basketball
College Athletics
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: No. 1 Kentucky jumped to a double-digit lead over Baylor early in the game, easily defeating the Bears to set up a meeting with its in-state rival, Louisville, in the Final Four.
snippet: No. 1 Kentucky jumped to a double-digit lead over Baylor early in the game, easily defeating the Bears to set up a meeting with its in-state rival, Louisville, in the Final Four.
